Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/4/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $648,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1986, off Jon Perlman (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1986, off Frank Viola (CHC)...
Injured on 7/28/1986 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1986, hitting .261 with 22 HR, 81 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 5/3/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1988, hitting .360 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against San Diego on 5/24/1988...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 5/30/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Sets a new season NL-Record for RBI with 120 on 9/12/1988...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1988...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,907,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,907,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1990, hitting .315 with 8 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1990, hitting .409 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,371,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/31/1991 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
6/24/1991: Signed a contract extension with Los Angeles, $10,000,000 per year, for 7 years.
Injured on 9/9/1991 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
